title: A true declaration of the troublesome voyadge of M. Iohn Haukins to the parties of Guynea and the west Indies, in the yeares of our Lord 1567. and 1568
author: Hawkins, John, Sir, 1532-1595.
publisher: In Poules Churchyarde, by Thomas Purfoote for Lucas Harrison, dwelling at the signe of the Crane,
